name: i2 Mobile Solutions
overview:
Founded in 2006 at the Pernambuco Technology Institute (ITEP), weâ€™re a brazilian based software development company focused in applications, content and solutions for mobile devices.

We help creative agencies, mobile telecoms, handset manufacturers, media groups and companies from North America, Latin America and Europe, to offer and communicate their products and services through smartphones and digital tablets applications and content.

Among our clients are NestlÃ©, BMW, TelefÃ´nica, Claro, Nokia, Nokia Insitute of Technology, Forum Nokia, Naspers, Cadbury, Nespresso and NIVEA.

Key Differentiators We offer more than just mobile application development services, we help clients from the beginning to the end of their projects, acting as consulting partners to identify the better mobile platform and solutions alternatives.

Our team is specialized and prepared to work in every step of mobile projects: concept, prototyping, planning, development, testing, publishing and monitoring.

We think and plan together with our clients. Itâ€™s not just about building mobile applications, we exchange technical and business expertise on the mobile market with our clients.

Our Team Our team is composed by talented multimedia artists, user experience designers, mobile developers and software testers leaded by the internationally awarded software architect Felipe Andrade, i2 mobile solutionsâ€™ founding director of products and services, responsible for i2mobileâ€™s day-to-day operations, as well as leading the companyâ€™s product development and technology strategy.

The business area is conducted by innovation and marketing specialist Luciano Ayres, CEO of i2, nominated by the British Council for national brazilian edition of the Young Interactive Entrepreneur Award 2008.

In the Research & Development field, our company keeps an academic roster of:

01 Doctor in Software Engineering 01 Doctor in Eletronics Engineering 01 Doctoral Candidate 06 Masters in Computer Sciences. Our scientific researches on mobile content and technology has been awarded multiple times by the brazilian government innovation programs. Due to all these characteristics, the company has been listed by several brazilian business and tech specialized magazines among the TOP 10 mobile companies in the country.

Location & Infrastructure Our main office is located at the stunning Boa Viagem beach, in the city of Recife, with a beautiful sea landscape view from all around the two store office. The city of Recife is one of the most famous brazilian technology and innovation centers where hundred of tech start ups are born every year through Porto Digital, an Information and Communication Technology Cluster with a focus on software development.

Our office space contains a large meeting and conference room, training room, relax area, individual lockers for every employee, bathrooms, shower, refectory area, administrative office and development area with 40 working positions capacity. We also take good care of our employees through health and child care assistance programs.

Partners Network Our partners network provides us with business opportunities, technical expertise and pre-release hardware and software to provide a hight quality services to our clients:

Google Android authorized developer company; Apple authorized developer company; BlackBerry Alliance Elite Member; Nokia Official Supplier; Forum Nokia PRO member; Forum Nokia Lauch Pad member; Microsoft BizSpark member; Motorola App Accelerator program member. In addition, our company is also a member of the Mobile Marketing Association (MMA), the biggest mobile marketing companies network in the planet.

Funding Since 2006, aproximatelly $800000 has been invested in the company by the most respected brazilian government innovation agencies FINEP and CNPq, that provide both financial and scientific support for our mobile technology research projects with a focus on innovative applications, user interfaces, hardware and interactivity.
